summary: Focusing on the theme of music, this overview page connects to various resources encompassing articles, courses, and profiles. The highlighted article dives into the concept of ecosystem architecture, a progressive approach that integrates decentralization and regenerative design to foster sustainable, non-natural ecosystems. Although other sections such as courses and profiles are currently empty, the compilation promises to evolve with diverse contributions within the music landscape.
excerpt: Ecosystem architecture merges decentralization with regenerative design, leveraging diverse fields to build and sustain healthy, distributed networks and communities.
